taskDescription:
Graph the inequality <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo><</mo>
  <mn>2.5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">x < 2.5</annotation></semantics></math> and write the solution in interval notation.
